entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Caledon
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 1:11 PM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Rain, 3.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Toronto Pearson Int'l Airport 3:00 PM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023
Condition: Rain
Temperature: 3.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.6 kPa falling
Visibility: 6.4 km
Humidity: 100 %
Dewpoint: 3.9°C
Wind: E 18 km/h gust 27 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Showers. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Freezing rain changing to rain showers near noon. Rainfall amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southwest 30 gusting to 60 late this afternoon. High plus 5. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries or rain showers. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of rain showers or flurries this evening. Flurries beginning late this evening. Local blowing snow late this evening and overnight. Local snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 70. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Clearing in the afternoon. Local blowing snow in the morning. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 70 becoming northwest 20 in the afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023
